Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near  Cermak-Chinatown due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near  Cermak-Chinatown due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
